name: Grilled Teri Sliders
author: Anonymous
summary: Teriyaki sauce and sweet onion add a Hawaiian flair to tasty grilled mini-burgers!
ingredients: 1 (12 count) package King's Hawaiian® Hawaiian Sweet Rolls
1 (10 ounce) bottle of your favorite teriyaki sauce
1  thinly sliced Maui or Vidalia onion
¼ teaspoon shichimi togarashi (Japanese red pepper condiment, available in Asian grocery stores)
directions: Hand press Angus hamburger on cutting board, flattening to 2 inches
Use 2-inch round cookie cutter, cut-out slider patties
Place hamburger patties on grill to desired doneness
Slice and toast King's Hawaiian Rolls on grill
To assemble burger, spread Shichimi aioli on each slice of bread; between bread slices, place hamburger, which has been brushed with teriyaki sauce, tomato slice, lettuce and onion
